content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Good afternoon, Mr. Rahman. Thank you for considering my apartment for rental. The monthly rental price for the 25 square meter apartment is 700 Euros. This is a fair market rate for a similar apartment in this area. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, the rental price is too high. Can you lower it?

I am a student, I am dependable and responsible, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am willing to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I would like to suggest a rental price of 600 Euros per month. Is that possible?

Thank you for your understanding.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your interest, Mr. Rahman. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial agreement. While the 700 Euros rental price is the market rate for a similar apartment in this area, I am willing to consider your suggestion of 600 Euros per month. However, I would like to clarify that this is a one-time offer and I am not willing to lower the rental price any further.

I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. If you have any other questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for your understanding. I understand that the rental price of 600 Euros is a fair price for this apartment. I am willing to accept this rental price.

I would like to sign the lease agreement as soon as possible. Can you provide me with the necessary documents and information to do so?

Thank you for your help.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Of course, Mr. Rahman. I am happy that we have come to an agreement on the rental price. I will prepare the necessary documents and information for you to sign the lease agreement. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns before signing.

Once the documents are ready, I will send them to you via email. You can then print them out and sign them at your convenience. Once signed, the lease agreement will become binding and you will be able to move into the apartment.

Thank you for choosing my apartment and for being a responsible and dependable tenant. I am looking forward to working with you.
name: Heinrich Heine
